timeline.bodyText: You will use last not empty extImp.getRef(). But in GO they will use first one.
timeline.author: DGarbar

timeline.bodyText: They set empty site if they have null, or update existing one
timeline.author: DGarbar

timeline.bodyText:
Also i'd rather extract this in another method and called like
final BidRequest outgoingRequest = request.toBuilder()
.imp(validImps)
.site(updateSite(request.site, reference))
.build();
timeline.author: DGarbar

timeline.bodyText: Are you sure that user not empty and buyeruid is not null ?
timeline.author: DGarbar

timeline.bodyText: They also check for status codes
timeline.author: DGarbar

timeline.bodyText: They also validates that price is above 0
timeline.author: DGarbar
DGarbar
DGarbar

timeline.bodyText:
I'm sorry, I suggested updateSite but not I think that it will be more appropriate to call modified site.
And pass only Site to the arguments, not all BidRequest
timeline.author: DGarbar

timeline.bodyText: make test that cur is from response
